lines.text: Old Uncle Impy is just a little bit cranky. No fun being locked up, especially in a bowling trophy.
It's too bad we had to kill her. I really liked the outfit she had on.
What is this, Midnight Wimp Bowling League?
Who are you? The Bride of Dracula?
Oooo. Jump back. Prom queen on the loose. Or is it high school hookers?
Uncle Impy will ignore that remark but he'll remember it.
